I

Ingredient - Class in Unnamed Package
The Ingredient class represents an ingredient with a name, quantity in cups, calories per cup, and total calories.
Ingredient(String, float, int) - Constructor for class Ingredient
Constructs an Ingredient with the specified name, number of cups, and calories per cup.

Main - Class in Unnamed Package
The Main class is the driver class to test the Recipe management system.

R

Recipe - Class in Unnamed Package
The Recipe class represents a recipe with a name, number of servings, ingredients, and total calories.
Recipe(String, int) - Constructor for class Recipe
Constructs a Recipe with the specified name and number of servings.
RecipeBox - Class in Unnamed Package
The RecipeBox class represents a collection of recipes.
RecipeBox() - Constructor for class RecipeBox
Constructs an empty RecipeBox.
RecipeBox(ArrayList<Recipe>) - Constructor for class RecipeBox
Constructs a RecipeBox with the specified list of recipes.
